circumstances: On final approach to Seattle-Boeing Field, both engine failed. The airplane lost height, struck electrical wires and crashed in flames in a parking lot. The pilot was injured and the aircraft was destroyed as well as seven cars.
probable_cause:
The probable causes were:
- Engine failure, 
- Mismanagement of fuel, 
- Fuel starvation, 
- Checklist not followed,
- Fuel selector on nose tank.
